data.content:
adjective
not so many :a smaller number of
I take fewer (and fewer) vacations every year.
He teaches (many) fewer classes than I do. <USAGER
usage see1less</USAGER
pronoun
a smaller number of people or things
Fewer came than were expected.
Few know and (even) fewer care about local history.
Fewer than 50 percent of registered voters turned out for the primary.
